A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was one of the best star wars films. I really enjoyed seeing the characters grow and change.  The twists were great and i was on the edge of ny seat.  It was something new and not a rehash of previous films. I also enjoy the new depth added to the force.  And once again it drives home the fact that ANYONE can be a jedi\, capturing the awe i had as a child.
